name: Panda Mania Jumper - Jump the Bamboo Game
name_original: Panda Mania Jumper - Jump the Bamboo Game
description:
Love pandas? Love jump games? Want to supercharge your day? Then “Panda Mania Jumper: Climb the Bamboo” is for you!

It’s an amazingly addictive, one-touch jump game. You’ll love the graphics and sound effects. And best of all, it’s 100% free!

Panda Mania Jumper is super easy to play. Just touch the screen to grow a bamboo. Then release your finger to make the panda climb the pole and jump to the next platform. The higher you climb, the farther you can jump. Do double and triple jumps and improve your score. It’s easy to learn and fun to play.

Be careful though! The flying yellow birds will bump you off your jump and make you crash. And if you land on a bomb, look out for the BOOM! Parrots, on the other hand, are friendly. Jump into them to earn an extra life. You can also watch video ads to earn extra lives.

Panda Mania Jumper is connected to Game Center, so you can invite your friends to play to compete for the best score. The more you play, the better your chances for ranking first on the leaderboard.

So why wait? Download “Panda Mania Jump” and let the good times roll!
